overview: Something BIG has been brewing at COLT, something BIGGER than BIG. COLT Studio Group is proud to present MASSIVE; John Rutherford's latest presentation of hard hitting, powerhouse man-sex. The name says it all; MASSIVE is about all things BIG. BIG MUSCLES, BIG COCKS and BIG ROCK-HARD MEN. These are men made of steel and with bodies that inspire awe. MASSIVE indulges in the appreciation of the finest and the biggest specimens of manhood; experiencing them at their best, in a state of raw, all-male sexual desire.
title: Massive
